mean_cn: v.毕业；渐渐变为；取得学位；授予学位；  n.毕业生；学位获得者；  adj.毕业的；研究生的
mean_en: to get a degree, especially your first degree, from a university or college
sentence: She graduated from university after four years' unforgettable life.
sentence_trans: 经过四年难忘的大学生活，她毕业了。
word_etyma: grad步 + uate使 → 完成所有步骤 → graduate毕业
